a.i._katy.name: A.I. Katy
a.i._katy.notes:
Time limited unitPhysical/magical cover tank who can also provide 70% breaks
Typically must use her cover each turn to reapply the barrier, or she's at a higher risk of dying.Alternately, she can be built for damage and used as a chainer, although this is a much less potent option.

mordegon.name: Mordegon
mordegon.notes:
Ice/dark magic chainer.
Requires extensive ramp up time to reach peak damage, and suffers greatly if he dies.
Can provide powerful breaks, but must be paired with another copy of himself so that they can stagger their break cooldowns to maintain 100%. And this won't work well against bosses that must be dispelled frequently.
Chains with the Absolute Zero family.

serena.name: Serena
serena.notes:
Healer with good utility.
Can buff magic mitigation by 30%, provide AoE reraise, grant ST ailment/charm/stop/break immunity (with AoE on a cooldown), restore MP, and briefly buff general mitigation by 40%.

veronica.name: Veronica
veronica.notes:
Nonelemental magic chainer.
Requires extensive ramp up time to reach peak damage, and suffers greatly if she dies.
Chains with the Absolute Zero family.

eleven.name: Eleven
eleven.notes:
Fire/lightning physical chainer.
Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

lovely_katy.name: Lovely Katy
lovely_katy.notes:
Time limited unitHealer that can also provide AoE reraise
Has a fairly bare-bones kit by healer standards.

riku.name: Riku
riku.notes:
Dark physical chainer.
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

sephiroth_(kh).name: Sephiroth (KH)
sephiroth_(kh).notes:
Time limited unitDark/light physical chainer
Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

elena.name: Elena
elena.notes:
Extremely powerful hybrid chainer with elemental flexibility and buffing capabilities.
Can provide stat buffs and mitigation to the party.
Chains with the Stardust Ray and Bolting Strike families.

sol.name: Sol
sol.notes:
Light/dark magic chainer.
Chains with the Chaos Wave family.

esther.name: Esther
esther.notes:
Ludicrously powerful lightning physical chainer.
Chains with the Bolting Strike, Absolute Mirror of Equity, and Aureole Ray (singlecast only) families.
Has absurd survivability for a damage dealer, with over twice as much HP as most other chainers on top of innate dodge and guts.

neverending_hope.name: Neverending Hope
neverending_hope.notes:
Versatile buffer who can grant a wide variety of elemental resistances
Excels at charging up the LB gauges of allies.Also has some subpar breaks that could be useful in rare situations.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

warrior_of_light_bartz.name: Warrior of Light Bartz
warrior_of_light_bartz.notes:
Wind physical chainer
Requires several turns of setup time before dealing any damage.Has Entrust, and his LB automatically fills at the beginning of each stage, allowing him to instantly fill any other unit's LB at the start of a fight if desired.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

warrior_of_light_lenna.name: Warrior of Light Lenna
warrior_of_light_lenna.notes:
Healer that can provide immunity to ailments, breaks, stop, and charm
Can buff mitigation by 30%.Has AoE reraise on her LB.Fills the LB gauge a bit while healing, and can massively fill ally LB gauged by emptying her own.

radiant_lightning.name: Radiant Lightning
radiant_lightning.notes:
Lightning physical chainer
Can serve as a breaker in a pinch, although her damage would suffer greatly and she would struggle with bosses that get dispelled.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

tsukiko.name: Tsukiko
tsukiko.notes:
Breaker with chaining capabilities.
Chains with the Absolute Zero, Bolting Strike, and Chaos Wave families.

zeno_of_the_beta_star.name: Zeno of the Beta Star
zeno_of_the_beta_star.notes:
Fire physical chainer
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

circe.name: Circe
circe.notes:
Powerful magic chainer with tons of elemental flexibility.
Chains with the Absolute Zero, Chaos Wave, and Bolting Strike families.

yuffie.name: Yuffie
yuffie.notes:
Powerful physical chainer with elemental flexibility.
Can provide AoE mirage.
Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

akstar.name: Akstar
akstar.notes:
Very powerful fire/ice physical chainer.
Requires several turns of ramp up to reach his maximum damage potential.
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

malphasie.name: Malphasie
malphasie.notes:
Powerful wind/dark hybrid chainer.
Can chain with the Bolting Strike, Aureole Ray, and Tornado families.
With her cooldown skill, she can AoE fill the LB gauge and break enemy DEF/SPR by 74%.

auron.name: Auron
auron.notes:
Extremely powerful breaker with solid physical chaining and elemental flexibility.
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

ellesperis.name: Ellesperis
ellesperis.notes:
Good dark physical chainer.
Chains with the Bolting Strike family.

mediena.name: Mediena
mediena.notes:
Magic ice chainer.
Can buff the party's stats and restore MP.
Chains with the Absolute Zero and Freeze families.

summer_fina_&_lid.name: Summer Fina & Lid
summer_fina_&_lid.notes:
Excellent breaker with incredible utility
In addition to providing breaks, has strong AoE healing, AoE reraise, AoE MP recovery, can grant a physical water Aureole Ray chaining move to allies and herself, can imbue allies with water (although this may also charm them), buff water resistance, imperil several elements, buff LB fill rate, and fill the LB gauge.

beowulf.name: Beowulf
beowulf.notes:
Excellent breaker with decent hybrid chaining capabilities.
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

citan.name: Citan
citan.notes:
Powerful physical chainer that can choose between water and wind.
Requires an external imperil. Unlike most chainers, he cannot apply one himself.
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

crimson.name: Crimson
crimson.notes:
Fire physical chainer.
Chains with the Divine Ruination and Absolute Mirror of Equity families, but the bulk of his damage comes from his LB, meaning it's far from ideal to pair him with anyone other than a duplicate.

randi.name: Randi
randi.notes:
Decent physical chainer with some elemental flexibility.
Chains with the Aureole Ray (singlecast only), Absolute Mirror of Equity, Bolting Strike, and Absolute Zero families.
Pairs decently with Esther due to being able to match her rotation, although his damage is far, far lower than hers.

regina.name: Regina
regina.notes:
Powerful physical finisher.
Can also serve as a chainer, as her LB will chain with a copy of her.
Suffers from very, very low survivability, and keeping her alive will be a struggle on many fights.

sacred_shield_charlotte.name: Sacred Shield Charlotte
sacred_shield_charlotte.notes:
Extremely durable provoke and magic cover tank with incredible support skills
All of her skills last four turns, instead of the more common two or three, giving her more spare turns.Can buff general mitigation by a whopping 50%, magic mitigation by 30%, fill LB gauges, buff light/ice resistance, buff DEF/SPR, and more.Can chain with the Aureole Ray, Disorder, and Absolute Zero families.

squall.name: Squall
squall.notes:
Solid physical chainer with elemental flexibility.
Can also function as a finisher, although his hits are spread out and may not fit well into many chains.
Technically chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family, but his chaining moves are very weak and the  bulk of his damage comes from capping his own chains with Keen Edge, which would break the chain when done with anyone but another Squall.

summer_folka_&_citra.name: Summer Folka & Citra
summer_folka_&_citra.notes:
Excellent water/light evoke chainer with incredible utility
Can grant ailment/break/charm/stop resistance to allies, buff water/light resistance, buff stats, AoE recover LB, buff LB fillrate, provide healing and mitigation (on a cooldown), and imbue allies with light (which may charm them).Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family, and can grant a physical water Aureole Ray attack to themselves or allies.

yego.name: Yego
yego.notes:
Strong earth physical chainer.
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

elly.name: Elly
elly.notes:
Very powerful magic chainer.
Wind is her strongest option, but earth isn't too far behind, and she can also choose to cap some of her chains with other elements if desired.
Chains with the Chaos Wave family.

folka.name: Folka
folka.notes:
Healer with a varied support kit.
Has Curaja and Reraise.
Can buff every type of mitigation (albeit on separate cooldown abilities that lack 100% uptime), provide immunity to breaks/ailments/stop/charm, and restore MP to the party.

kaito.name: Kaito
kaito.notes: Physical solo damage dealer with AoE mirage.

jecht.name: Jecht
jecht.notes:
Powerful water physical chainer.
Chains with the Divine Ruination and Quick Hit families.

karlette.name: Karlette
karlette.notes:
Excellent hybrid chainer with elemental flexiblity and support capabilities.
Can buff elemental resistances and mitigation.
Can AoE break ATK/MAG by 70%, but this ability is on a cooldown.
Chains with the Quick Hit, Absolute Mirror of Equity, and Aureole Ray families.

loren.name: Loren
loren.notes:
Extremely powerful breaker with solid physical chaining and elemental flexibility.
Can chain with the Onion Slice and Aureole Ray families.

machina.name: Machina
machina.notes:
Solid physical chainer with several elemental options and amazing utility.
Can break ATK/MAG and DEF/SPR by 70% on-demand, although this only lasts for one turn and will decay into weaker breaks over the next several turns.
His LB breaks ATK/MAG by a massive 79%.
Can AoE buff physical/magical mitigation and provide SPR break immunity.
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

myra.name: Myra
myra.notes:
Excellent healer that can also provide buffs.
Can bring stat buffs, partial ailment immunity, break immunity, and charm immunity.
Has a version of Entrust that works with W-Ability.
Her healing output is slightly lower than that of most other healers.

nagi.name: Nagi
nagi.notes:
Light/dark hybrid chainer.
Chains with the Divine Ruination and Aureole Ray families.

sephiroth.name: Sephiroth
sephiroth.notes:
Good light and dark physical chainer.
Has a huge variety of available chaining partners: the Absolute Mirror of Equity, Quick Hit, Divine Ruination, Octaslash, and Onion Slice families.
His damage requires several turns to ramp up.

sylvie.name: Sylvie
sylvie.notes:
Excellent support unit with incredible utility.
Can provide typed mitigation, stat buffs, ailment immunity, break immunity, and massive elemental resistances.
Can grant physical or chaining moves to allies (Bolting Strike and Absolute Mirror of Equity options for both types), and imbue allies with several different elements.
Has 70% breaks for ATK/MAG and DEF/SPR, albeit on a cooldown.

zack.name: Zack
zack.notes:
Excellent physical finisher.
Relies on an external imbue to maximize his damage output.

2b.name: 2B
2b.notes: Extremely powerful breaker and lightning physical chainer.

aerith.name: Aerith
aerith.notes:
Excellent healer with solid utility.
Can provide break immunity, AoE reraise, 30% general mitigation, and help to fill LBs.

chow.name: Chow
chow.notes:
Powerful and unusual combination of healer and magic cover tank.
Has Curaja along with a solid tanking kit.
LB is a powerful 54% mitigation cooldown that also refills the team's MP.

fei.name: Fei
fei.notes:
Dark physical chainer with very high damage output.
Can also chain with wind, which is noticeably weaker, or with several other elements, which are drastically weaker but could be useful in certain situations.
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family (only with his dark move).

kurasame.name: Kurasame
kurasame.notes:
Hybrid ice chainer with high damage output.
Chains with the Quick Hit family.

morgana.name: Morgana
morgana.notes:
Evoke chainer.
Suffers from insufficient orb generation, making it impossible to maintain her ideal damage rotation without significant external support.
Chains with the Absolute Zero and Chaos Wave families.

sieghard.name: Sieghard
sieghard.notes:
Physical cover and provoke tank.
He technically can cover magic, but the cooldown on that ability is longer than the duration, preventing him from serving in that role effectively.
His LB provides a powerful 45% general mitigation buff to the party for three turns.

olberic.name: Olberic
olberic.notes:
Physical cover and provoke tank.
His LB provides a powerful 40% general mitigation buff to the party for three turns.
Chains with the Aureole Ray family.

primrose.name: Primrose
primrose.notes:
Buffer with a fairly standard kit.
Can buff mitigation by up to 40% (but drops down to 30% on some turns due to cooldowns), provides stat buffs, imbues allies with dark, and can fill the LB gauge.
Chains with the Chaos Wave family.

kimono_fina.name: Kimono Fina
kimono_fina.notes:
Ice/light magic chainer
Chains with the Chaos Wave family.Can provide some minor support capabilities, most notably LB fill via her own LB.

sophia.name: Sophia
sophia.notes:
Excellent magical chainer with elemental flexibility.
Chains with the Chaos Wave and Quake families.

sora.name: Sora
sora.notes:
Physical chainer.
Has no imperils of his own.
Chains with the Divine Ruination and Absolute Mirror of Equity families.

wilhelm.name: Wilhelm
wilhelm.notes:
Extremely powerful provoke and physical cover tank.
Has excellent utility in the form of his powerful mitigation LB, LB fill rate counter, and single-stat 60% ATK/MAG breaks.

yuraisha.name: Yuraisha
yuraisha.notes:
Excellent support unit with powerful buffs.
Can provide large buffs to all stats, as well as all three types of mitigation.
Has AoE barriers, resistance buffs, and AoE HP/MP regen.
Can cure breaks.

ayaka.name: Ayaka
ayaka.notes:
Powerful healer with great utility.
She can provide massive healing, reraise team members, restore MP, AoE fill the LB gauge, grant immunity to stop, and protect the team with AoE barriers.
Her LB will also remove breaks and charm, but it takes forever to fill up.

basch.name: Basch
basch.notes:
Solid physical and magical cover tank.
Has some support capabilities in the form of breaks and buffs.

beatrix.name: Beatrix
beatrix.notes:
Powerful ATK/MAG breaker and chainer.
Her damage suffers tremendously if she tries to chain and break at the same time, so you will often just focus on breaking and let her partner do most of the damage, or bring a separate breaker and just have her chain.

cloud_(kh).name: Cloud (KH)
cloud_(kh).notes:
Time limited unitPhysical chainer
Has no imperils of his own.Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

fayt.name: Fayt
fayt.notes:
Excellent physical chainer with elemental flexibility.
Requires quite a few turns of ramp-up to reach his maximum damage potential.
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

felix.name: Felix
felix.notes:
Powerful fire/earth hybrid chainer.
Has no real chaining partners-- technically, several of his moves do belong to the Aureole Ray and Octaslash families, but those moves are very weak and he wants to cap his chains with the much stronger Salute - Blade Rush, something that only another Felix can do.
Requires several turns to really get going.

kunshira.name: Kunshira
kunshira.notes:
Good hybrid chainer with great elemental flexibility.
Can massively buff various elemental resistances, while also buffing DEF/SPR at the same time. With two of her, you can maintain this buff 100% of the time..
Chains with the Aureole Ray family.

lila.name: Lila
lila.notes:
Strong physical chainer.
She also has SPR-scaling moves, but they are much weaker.
She can switch between fire and lightning damage.
Chains with the Graviton Cannon and Stardust Ray families.

lotus_mage_fina.name: Lotus Mage Fina
lotus_mage_fina.notes:
Excellent healer with Curaja and Reraise
Can also apply AoE reraise.With her latent abilities, she can provide good buffs and elemental resistances via W-Ability, although the low healing on the turns that she refreshes these effects might be a problem.

lulu.name: Lulu
lulu.notes:
Solid water magic chainer.
Chains with the Flood family, but damage will drop drastically with anyone other than a dupe.

prompto.name: Prompto
prompto.notes:
Breaker with chaining capabilities.
Chains with the Octaslash family.
Has a 65% AoE ATK/MAG break and a 70% DEF break.

rena.name: Rena
rena.notes:
Healer with access to powerful buffs.
Relies heavily on her LB, but can struggle to fill it up consistently unless you gear for it at the expense of healing stats.

tiana.name: Tiana
tiana.notes:
Very powerful earth magic chainer.
Chains with the Quake family.
Can help to sustain the party's HP/MP via her limit burst.

tifa.name: Tifa
tifa.notes:
Excellent water physical chainer.
Requires several turns of ramp up.
Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

white_knight_noel.name: White Knight Noel
white_knight_noel.notes:
Time limited unitProvoke and magic cover tank
Has very little in the way of utility, but can chain with the Freeze and Tornado families.

yun.name: Yun
yun.notes:
Good fire physical chainer.
Chains with the Octaslash and Absolute Mirror of Equity families.

yuna.name: Yuna
yuna.notes:
Excellent healer with Curaja and Reraise.
Also has great utility-- various Bar-ga resistance spells, esper gauge fill, and a powerful DEF/SPR buffs on her LB.

a2.name: A2
a2.notes:
Powerful physical chainer that automatically provides a 50% ATK/MAG break while chaining.
Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

awakened_rain.name: Awakened Rain
awakened_rain.notes:
Extremely powerful magic cover and provoke tank
Can grant ailment/stop immunity to allies.Has AoE heals/MP restoration, at the cost of LB gauge.

balthier.name: Balthier
balthier.notes:
Powerful physical finisher with elemental flexibility.
His damage output is heavily affected by randomness, and may break some chains.

barbariccia.name: Barbariccia
barbariccia.notes:
Great magical wind chainer.
Can cap her chains with Raging Wind for massive damage after several turns of ramp-up, or instead cap with Aeroja for AoE damage.
Chains with the Tornado family.

beryl.name: Beryl
beryl.notes:
Solid unit that can fill several roles.
Ideally used as either a tank who also chains, or as a chainer that also provides powerful breaks.
Chains with the Bolting Strike, Chaos Wave, Octaslash, and Disorder families.

christine.name: Christine
christine.notes:
Ice magic chainer.
Technically chains with several families, but in practice, her damage will plummet if she is not paired with a copy of herself.

eiko.name: Eiko
eiko.notes:
Solid healer.
Can cure all debuffs, including berserk, charm, stop, imperils, and breaks.

fryevia.name: Fryevia
fryevia.notes:
Great ice hybrid chainer.
Chains with the Divine Ruination and Octaslash families.

grim_lord_sakura.name: Grim Lord Sakura
grim_lord_sakura.notes:
Time limited unitFire/dark magic chainer with support capabilities
Chains with the Chaos Wave family.Can buff DEF/SPR, provide 35% AoE mitigation, reraise allies, grant break/partial ailment immunity, apply barriers, restore MP, and slightly fill the LB gauge.

hyoh.name: Hyoh
hyoh.notes:
Solid fire/lightning physical chainer.
Can AoE chain with his LB.
Chains with the Divine Ruination and Onion Slice families.

kryla.name: Kryla
kryla.notes:
Excellent breaker, with breaks of up to 74% for every stat, including a turn 1 70% full break.
Can also imperil various elements, buff elemental resistances, and dispel + rebreak on the same turn.
Chains with the Absolute Zero, Bolting Strike, and Chaos Wave families.

lilith.name: Lilith
lilith.notes:
Solid magic cover tank with limited utility.
Can also cover physical damage, but her stats are not well-suited for it.
Can chain with the Kingsglaive and Aureole Ray families.
Can provide significant self-sustain for her own HP/MP.

maritime_strategist_nichol.name: Maritime Strategist Nichol
maritime_strategist_nichol.notes:
Powerful buffer with access to a wide range of potent abilities
Can buff all stats, regenerate HP/MP for the party, provide mitigation, buff elemental resistances, and cure breaks. Almost all of his abilities can be dualcast via Linked Stance.Can also help to fill the LB and esper gauges.

queen.name: Queen
queen.notes:
Lightning physical chainer.
Has very high survivability thanks to the 200% DEF/SPR buffs from Berserk+2.
Provides MP regen for the party.
Chains with the Quick Hit family.

raegen.name: Raegen
raegen.notes:
Fire and ice physical chainer.
Imbues himself with both elements as part of his rotation, so his damage suffers noticeably if the enemy is immune to either one.
Can buff most elemental resistances.
Chains with the Divine Ruination and Absolute Mirror of Equity families.

rem.name: Rem
rem.notes:
Unusual combination of healer and chainer.
Can dualcast Curaja and Tornado, allowing her to serve as a support chainer.
Unlike most 7* healers, does not have the ability to heal and reraise on the same turn.

seaside_nichol.name: Seaside Nichol
seaside_nichol.notes:
Support unit focusing exclusively on defensive buffs
Can provide significant DEF/SPR buffs, all three types of mitigation, and some minor barriers.Unfortunately, his physical/magical mitigation buffs cannot be dualcast, which means he cannot provide much in the way of HP/MP restoration while maintaining those.Can cure imperils and berserk (as well as breaks, charm, and stop).Has chaining moves with Freeze and Flood frames, but his personal damage is very, very low.

zargabaath.name: Zargabaath
zargabaath.notes:
Excellent support unit with powerful buffs.
Can massively buff stats and mitigation, especially via his LB.
Can temporarily provide break immunity.
Can reraise allies and provide massive HP/MP restoration to single targets.
Can chain with the Octaslash family.

aloha_lasswell.name: Aloha Lasswell
aloha_lasswell.notes:
Water/wind physical chainer with high innate evasion
Reaches 80% dodge with just two copies of his own TM, making it very easy to gear him for 100%.Has a provoke skill.He has a physical AoE cover ability with a cooldown. If you pair him with another copy, you can alternate the cooldowns and maintain 100% uptime.Burns through MP very, very quickly.Chains with the Absolute Mirror of Equity family.

ang.name: Ang
ang.notes:
Strong fire physical finisher.
Relies heavily on his limit burst for optimal damage output.

bart.name: Bart
bart.notes:
Bizarre mix of dodge-based provoke tank, support, and chainer.
His chaining damage is fairly average.
Can provide 60% AoE breaks, AoE mirage, AoE LB fill rate, single target imbues, single target LB fill, and some minor AoE MP sustain.
Chains with the Kingsglaive, Tornado, and Flood families.

cid.name: Cid
cid.notes:
Physical finisher.
Requires several turns of setup, and relies heavily on external imperils in order to deal good damage, but can burst very hard in the right circumstances.

elephim.name: Elephim
elephim.notes:
Great support unit with both breaks and buffs.
Can break ATK/MAG by 55% on T1 while also buffing DEF/SPR, then eventually ramp into her LB for a 75% full break and 145% buffs to all stats.
Gear her for LB autofill.

heavenly_technician_lid.name: Heavenly Technician Lid
heavenly_technician_lid.notes:
Powerful breaker
Her T1 AoE breaks aren't quite as strong as those of some other units, but she can later on upgrade them to 79%, which are among the strongest in the game.

rivera.name: Rivera
rivera.notes:
Unusual support unit able to turn any ally into a provoke tank or AoE physical cover tank, although whoever she picks will be significantly less durable than a "normal" tank.
Can provide AoE Mirage, restore MP, and heal.

lenneth.name: Lenneth
lenneth.notes:
Good dark physical chainer.
Has very high damage, but also very high MP consumption.
Can somewhat chain with the Piledriver family, but expect breaks as Lenneth caps her own chains and does not use Piledriver twice.

rinoa.name: Rinoa
rinoa.notes:
Strong non-elemental magic finisher.
Can slightly fill ally LB gauges with Aura.

trance_terra.name: Trance Terra
trance_terra.notes:
Fire/dark magic chainer
Requires an external imperil.Very high MP consumption.Chains with the Chaos Wave family.

aranea.name: Aranea
aranea.notes:
Good physical finisher.
Has no utility and requires several turns of setup for one turn of mediocre burst damage.

flammie.name: Flammie
flammie.notes:
Can serve as a buffer or as a finisher, but not both at the same time.
As a buffer, he has some uncommon and useful utility, but is also missing some standard buffer abilities, such as 100% uptime on general mitigation and AoE MP regen, which may force you to rely on other units to cover the gaps in his kit.
As a finisher, deals fairly good damage.
Can chain with the Aureole Ray family.

gladiolus.name: Gladiolus
gladiolus.notes:
Physical cover tank.
His other skills are, unfortunately, mostly irrelevant.

nalu.name: Nalu
nalu.notes:
Lightning physical chainer.
Has Tidus frames, giving her several chaining partners. However, because she is best build with TDH and does not have W-Ability, she will not chain properly with DW partners.
Also, her damage drops significantly when not chaining with a copy, due to relying on her LB and her cooldown skill, which have unique frames.

tidus.name: Tidus
tidus.notes:
Good DH water physical chainer.
Technically chains with the Quick Hit family, but his rotation is a mess. Constant switching between single cast, dual cast, and triple cast means he has no real partners.

veritas_of_the_dark.name: Veritas of the Dark
veritas_of_the_dark.notes:
Good dark physical chainer
Has a bit of utility in the form of AoE mitigation, AoE full break, 74% ATK break on his LB, and AoE dark resistance.Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

aileen.name: Aileen
aileen.notes:
Terrible earth physical chainer.
Can provide AoE LB fill.
Chains with the Stardust Ray family.

estark.name: Estark
estark.notes:
Mediocre dark physical chainer with innate dual wield.
Has a 60% ATK break.
Can chain with the Divine Ruination family.

ignis.name: Ignis
ignis.notes:
Decent buffer who requires setup turns.
Can provide AoE ailment and break immunity.
Can imbue allies with several different elements.

jiraiya.name: Jiraiya
jiraiya.notes:
Subpar hybrid chainer with some elemental flexibility.
Requires setup before he can use any of his best moves, and even then his damage isn't amazing.
After setup, he can chain with the Divine Ruination, Kingsglaive, and Octaslash families.
Can provide decent AoE elemental resists with attached mirage.

nyx.name: Nyx
nyx.notes:
Physical fire chainer with good damage and utility.
Can AoE fill the team's LB by sacrificing his life.
Relies on Fixed Dice for good damage output, which means that he can be very inconsistent.

orlandeau.name: Orlandeau
orlandeau.notes:
Light physical chainer.
Chains with the Divine Ruination family.

reberta.name: Reberta
reberta.notes:
Fire/ice/lightning physical chainer or finisher.
It can be difficult to chain her consistently due to the timing required to properly cap her delayed chains with her timed jump.

roy.name: Roy
roy.notes:
Support unit with strong buffs and breaks on T1. However, as soon as they expire, he becomes significantly worse because he can't refresh them with the same potency.
Works best when paired with another breaker who cannot break well on T1.

veritas_of_the_flame.name: Veritas of the Flame
veritas_of_the_flame.notes:
Fire finisher
Can burst extremely hard via his cooldown.

veritas_of_the_light.name: Veritas of the Light
veritas_of_the_light.notes:
Light hybrid AoE chainer
Can cure all debuffs from a single ally, including berserk, charm, stop, imperils, and breaks.

blossom_sage_sakura.name: Blossom Sage Sakura
blossom_sage_sakura.notes:
Lightning magic chainer
Has some decent support capabilities, including AoE mitigation and ailment immunity buffs.

cloud.name: Cloud
cloud.notes:
Mediocre physical finisher.
Can also chain with the Meteor Rain family, but the damage is pretty bad.

duke.name: Duke
duke.notes:
Decent ice physical finisher.
Requires several turns of setup.
Can also be used as a subpar chainer, but the damage is low and he has no partners.

elfreeda.name: Elfreeda
elfreeda.notes:
Competent provoke tank.
Can chain with a copy, although the damage is unremarkable.
Has 45% breaks that also dispel the enemy; can be useful for enemies that frequently buff themselves.

emperor.name: Emperor
emperor.notes:
Good fire magical finisher.
Requires a few turns to ramp up.

ignacio.name: Ignacio
ignacio.notes:
Fire physical finisher who can also imbue other units with fire.
Has some minor buffing capabilities, but the stat buffs cost LB crystals.

lunera.name: Lunera
lunera.notes:
Mediocre magic chainer with some buffing capabilities.
Chains with the Aureole Ray family.

lucius.name: Lucius
lucius.notes:
Competent physical chainer.
Lacks imperils and has no utility.
Chains with the Kingsglaive, Octaslash, and Aureole Ray families.

prishe.name: Prishe
prishe.notes:
Physical chainer.
Locked behind setup turns and has no chaining partners.
Can provide AoE reraise.

viktor_marchenko.name: Viktor Marchenko
viktor_marchenko.notes:
Time limited unitProvoke tank with subpar survivability but mediocre damage dealing capabilities
Can either chain or finish with skills that scale off of DEF.Can become immune to charm, stop, breaks, and ailments.Can heal himself and restore his own MP.

vincent.name: Vincent
vincent.notes:
Subpar physical chainer with no partners.
Has a single target 55% full break.

arngrim.name: Arngrim
arngrim.notes:
Competent fire finisher.
Burns through MP very quickly.

dragonlord.name: Dragonlord
dragonlord.notes:
Competent fire magical finisher.
Has very high modifiers, but his damage output is limited by his low MAG.

fohlen.name: Fohlen
fohlen.notes:
Mediocre physical finisher.
His burst is decent but requires several turns of setup.
He can also chain, but the damage is awful.

gilgamesh.name: Gilgamesh
gilgamesh.notes:
Mediocre physical chainer.
Can gear for almost any type of killer passive by equipping different weapon types.
Has a 55% full break.
He has two moves with Divine Ruination frames. The baseline move does only 7 damage. He has a much stronger version that he can unlock by using his limit burst, but it can take several turns to get to that point.
He fares better when chaining with a duplicate, as he can then use Tri-Attack starting from turn 1.

lightning.name: Lightning
lightning.notes:
Mediocre lightning physical chainer.
Chains with the Quick Hit family.
Buffs her own stats by 150%, which can allow you to forego a buffer.

nameless_gunner_jake.name: Nameless Gunner Jake
nameless_gunner_jake.notes:
Solid physical finisher with elemental flexibility
Requires several turns of setup.

noctis.name: Noctis
noctis.notes:
Bizarre physical chainer who requires setup and has several turns of downtime.
Damage output is high while Armiger Wakes, then plummets to almost nothing for several turns while waiting for the unlock to cool down again.

olive.name: Olive
olive.notes:
Lightning finisher.
Can deal significant burst damage with Immolation Blast, although you'll need to raise or reraise her, as she dies when she uses it.

ramza.name: Ramza
ramza.notes:
Mediocre support unit with breaks and buffs, although he has trouble providing both at once in a clean rotation.
Can dualcast 60% breaks for all four stats.
Can sing for buffs/regen, but you will have gaps in the song buff uptime if you try to have him also maintain breaks.
Consider giving Cradle of Horns to him or another party member to cover those gaps.

ace.name: Ace
ace.notes:
Decent support unit with a bit of bonus offensive potential.
Unfortunately, his buffs are random, but even the worst case is still decent.
He can also cap chains with his LB and imperil fire/lightning/light by 75%.

delita.name: Delita
delita.notes:
Decent dark physical chainer.
His damage increases significantly if the enemy is susceptible to DEF breaks.
Can chain with 7★ Ramza.

luneth.name: Luneth
luneth.notes:
Mediocre physical chainer with significant spike damage.
Only chains with a dupe.
The overwhelming majority of his damage comes from Swordshower, which he can only use once every three turns.

qin.name: Qin
qin.notes:
Support unit that suffers from extensive setup time.
Cannot provide all of the same benefits at once that other buffers can, forcing you to pick and choose which effects you want.

seabreeze_dark_fina.name: Seabreeze Dark Fina
seabreeze_dark_fina.notes:
Magic chainer
She is locked into using two elements at once, has ramp up time, and will suffer greatly if she dies or if the boss gets dispelled.Her damage is absolutely terrible unless you unlock her latent abilities.

shadow_lord.name: Shadow Lord
shadow_lord.notes:
Subpar dark physical chainer or finisher
Chains with the Octaslash family.

citra.name: Citra
citra.notes:
Terrible magical light chainer with some minor support capabilities.
She can chain with the Divine Ruination family.
Can buff the party's magic mitigation by 20%, refill MP, fill the esper gauge, and heal the party a bit.

dark_fina.name: Dark Fina
dark_fina.notes:
Magic chainer
She is locked into using three elements at once, has ramp up time, and will suffer greatly if she dies or if the boss gets dispelled.Her damage is absolutely terrible unless you unlock her latent abilities.

marie.name: Marie
marie.notes:
Mediocre support unit with lots of defensive options.
Can buff elemental resistances, provide elemental immunity, and (on a cooldown) provide AoE mitigation or barriers, which is good for surviving nasty boss threshold attacks.
